00018 #include <stdio.h>
00019 #include <string>
00020 #include "pdbwriter.h"

00023 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 void PDBWriter::Open(string file, bool bAppend)
00028 {
00029     _out = fopen(file.c_str(), bAppend ? "at" : "wt");
00030 }
00031 
00032 void PDBWriter::Close()
00033 {
00034     fclose(_out);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void PDBWriter::Write(Topology *conf)
00038 {
00039     Topology *top = conf;
00040     fprintf(_out, "MODEL     %4d\n", conf->getStep());
00041     for(BeadContainer::iterator iter=conf->Beads().begin();
00042     iter!=conf->Beads().end(); ++iter) {
00043         Bead *bi = *iter;
00044         vec r = bi->getPos();
00045         //truncate strings if necessary
00046         string resname="";
00047         if(top->getResidue(bi->getResnr()))
00048             resname = top->getResidue(bi->getResnr())->getName();
00049         string atomname = bi->getName();
00050         if (resname.size() > 3) {
00051             resname = resname.substr(0,3);
00052         }
00053         if (atomname.size() > 4) {
00054             atomname = atomname.substr(0,4);
00055         }
00056         
00057         fprintf(_out,
00058                 "ATOM  %5d %4s %3s %1s%4d    %8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f\n",
00059                 (bi->getId()+1)%100000,   // atom serial number
00060                 atomname.c_str(),  // atom name
00061                 resname.c_str(), // residue name
00062                 " ", // chain identifier 1 char
00063                 bi->getResnr()+1, // residue sequence number
00064                 10.*r.x(), 10.*r.y(), 10.*r.z(),
00065                 bi->getQ(), bi->getM());  // is this correct??
00066           
00067         if(bi->getSymmetry()>=2) {
00068            vec ru = 0.1*bi->getU() + r;
00069        
00070             fprintf(_out,
00071                 "HETATM%5d %4s %3s %1s%4d    %8.3f%8.3f%8.4f%6.2f%6.2f\n",
00072                 bi->getId()+1,   // atom serial number
00073                 bi->getName().c_str(),  // atom name
00074                 "REU", // residue name
00075                 " ", // chain identifier 1 char
00076                 bi->getResnr()+1, // residue sequence number
00077                 10.*ru.x(), 10.*ru.y(), 10.*ru.z(),
00078                 0., 0.);  // is this correct??
00079         }
00080         if(bi->getSymmetry()>=3) {
00081            vec rv = 0.1*bi->getV() + r;
00082             fprintf(_out,
00083                 "HETATM%5d %4s %3s %1s%4d    %8.3f%8.3f%8.4f%6.2f%6.2f\n",
00084                 bi->getId()+1,   // atom serial number
00085                 bi->getName().c_str(),  // atom name
00086                 "REV", // residue name
00087                 " ", // chain identifier 1 char
00088                 bi->getResnr()+1, // residue sequence number
00089                 10.*rv.x(), 10.*rv.y(), 10.*rv.z(),
00090                 0.,0.);  // is this correct??  /**/
00091         }
00092    }
00093     fprintf(_out, "ENDMDL\n");
00094     fflush(_out);
00095 }
